metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24613 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low.
metadata.Description: metadata-extractor up to 2.16.0 can throw various uncaught exceptions while parsing a specially crafted JPEG file, which could result in an application crash. This could be used to mount a denial of service attack against services that use metadata-extractor library.

criterions.comment: libmetadata-extractor-java package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
